name: Saffron
label: spices
description: Fresh Saffron, known as the world's most expensive spice, adds a rich flavor and vibrant color to dishes.

name: Shilajit
label: spices
description: Fresh Shilajit, a potent herbal remedy from the Himalayas, is renowned for its rejuvenating and energy-boosting properties.

name: Kehwa Masala
label: spices
description: Fresh Kehwa Masala is a traditional Kashmiri blend of spices used to make aromatic tea, known for its warmth and flavor.
